subject: Skiing
Alpine Skiing
World Cup (Skiing)
World Cup (Skiing)
Skiing
lead_paragraph: Lindsey Vonn won a women’s World Cup downhill in Cortina, Italy, on Saturday to set a record of 37 victories in the discipline.
snippet: Lindsey Vonn won a women’s World Cup downhill in Cortina, Italy, on Saturday to set a record of 37 victories in the discipline.
